alert.note: Alert for Dubuque; Jackson (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 7:29PM CDT until July 28 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Quad Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Jo Daviess County in northwestern Illinois... North central Jackson County in east central Iowa... Central Dubuque County in northeastern Iowa... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 728 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Edmore to Swiss Valley Park, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Dubuque, Galena, Asbury, Bellevue, East Dubuque, Peosta, Menominee, Sherrill, Council Hill, St. Donatus, Centralia, Sageville, Durango, Guilford, Rice, Graf, Dubuque Regional Airport, Aiken, Rockdale and Lattnerville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building.
